successes.title: BRIDEGROOM - A Love Story, Unequaled
successes.description: Watch the video that millions have seen and that might help change the way people view marriage equality.

Pledges.description: A sincere thank you and (if you want) inclusion on our email list so you can get updates about our progress.  Also your name will be placed on our website's BRIDEGROOM Hall of Fame, plus you will get a free download of Coleen McMahon’s song, “Beautiful Boy,” which was featured in Shane's YouTube presentation, “It Could Happen To You.” (You can remain anonymous if you wish and still receive your rewards)
All the rewards previously listed, PLUS your photo will become a part of the BRIDEGROOM logo which will be featured on the Bridegroom website.
All the rewards previously listed, PLUS a DVD of BRIDEGROOM and your photo will become part of the BRIDEGROOM logo which will also be featured on the movie poster.
All the rewards previously listed, plus a BRIDEGROOM T-shirt.
All the rewards previously listed, plus BRIDEGROOM on Blu-ray!
All the rewards previously listed, plus a 20x13 poster from the film.
All the rewards previously listed, plus a signed Blu-ray of the film, plus a full size (39x27) BRIDEGROOM movie poster.
All the rewards previously listed, plus a phone call of thanks from Shane Bitney Crone PLUS a full size BRIDEGROOM movie poster signed by Shane, Linda Bloodworth-Thomason, and the producers.
All the rewards previously listed, plus an honorary Associate producer credit on the end film credits.
All the rewards previously listed, plus an unforgettable dinner with Shane, Linda Bloodworth-Thomason and the producers of BRIDEGROOM in Los Angeles (accommodations not provided).

All the rewards previously listed, plus you and a guest will walk the red carpet and attend the premiere (tickets provided) in New York or Los Angeles! You pick the city. (Travel and accommodations not provided.)

You are now listed as an Executive Producer of the end film credits. Although it’s an honorary credit – it’s an incredibly important one; we can’t make this film without you. We will fly you and a guest to the Los Angeles premiere in October (accommodations not provided). You will walk the red carpet and have your photo taken with the director and producers.
